page.title: 05The Maldon Bypass
page.content: One of the major{social concerns}of the Maldon and Heybridge area currently occupying the minds of the local residents is the proposed plan for a ring road around Maldon. There is little doubt that such a bypass scheme is badly needed. The High Street, which is narrow and winding, and{Market Hill,}of which there is a slide, are now a permanent bottle-neck and there is some worry about the effect of the continual traffic on the fine examples of Georgian houses situated here. There are two main proposals :- 1) For the Maldon ring road to also bypass Heybridge and 2) For the ring road to run through Heybridge. At present the village of Heybridge is split and there is some acrimony between the residents.
